meanings.definition: A cylindrical object or structure with a hollow center.
meanings.sent1: The plumber brought new tubulars to fix the leak.
meanings.sent2: The factory produced tubulars for the construction project.
meanings.sent3: When the tubulars rolled off the truck, they made a clanging sound.
meanings.sent4: The tubulars of light from the street lamps illuminated the path ahead.
meanings.sent5: The children used the tubulars as pretend telescopes during playtime.

meanings.definition: A type of tire with an inner tube.
meanings.sent1: The bike shop recommended tubulars for better traction.
meanings.sent2: Racers prefer tubulars for their lightweight design.
meanings.sent3: The tubulars on the bicycle went flat during the race.
meanings.sent4: The tubulars glided smoothly over the rough terrain.
meanings.sent5: He always carries spare tubulars in case of a puncture.

meanings.definition: A type of pasta in the shape of a tube.
meanings.sent1: She cooked a delicious dish using tubulars and cheese.
meanings.sent2: The tubulars were perfect for holding the sauce.
meanings.sent3: The tubulars in the pasta salad were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The tubulars intertwined with the sauce, creating a tasty blend.
meanings.sent5: The tubulars added a fun twist to the traditional pasta dish.
